        Description copied from class: Skill
        Get a pre-formatted description that can be sent to the user. Message should contain a brief description followed by any specifics defined by the Skill. For example, the TwoHandedSkill should have details about what the current hit chance and bonus damage is.

        Returns a key that can be used to figure out what skill information is being looked at in a player config file. The key can be simple, but should try to be unique. For example, two-handed skill could have "two_handed"

      • getOvenRecipe

        public CookingSkill.OvenRecipe getOvenRecipe(org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack input)
        Scans the available recipes given the provided input and returns the first matching recipe. If multiple recipes are defined with the same input, the first registered is returned.
        Returns:
        A recipe with the same input as given, if one exists. Null otherwise

        With the provided inputs, looks for a combine recipe with the same constraints. The recipe provided must match all constraints. This included names
